hero.description: We automate the search and application process for funding. So you can focus on what matters:

problem.statusQuoReason1: No time for hours of research in official gazettes.
problem.statusQuoReason2: Missed deadlines for "Head Start" or "DigitalPakt" programs.
problem.solutionFeature1Desc: We find programs that match your school exactly.
problem.solutionFeature3Desc: Finished applications in 30 seconds. Standard compliant.

howItWorks.title: How the Process Works
howItWorks.description: You provide the idea (e.g., "New school garden"). Our platform handles the rest – from research to the ready-to-sign PDF.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Simply enter your school's name. We automatically load mission statement and data from the web.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We filter thousands of programs (federal, state, EU, foundations) and show only those that truly fit.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Our AI writes the application text, provides pedagogical justification, and formats everything to DIN 5008.

examples.title: What You Can Finance
examples.description: Typical projects successfully funded through EduFunds.
examples.greenClassroomDesc: School garden, raised beds, or schoolyard de-paving.
examples.makerspaceDesc: Tablets, robotics sets, or media room setup.
examples.fulltimeDesc: Furniture for quiet rooms, play equipment, or kitchen facilities.
